text: Not sure I know enough to comment <@U2MLMERFD> but are you using a custom `KeyValueStore`? I wasn't aware of any use of SQL in the Fabric (could totally be wrong), so maybe there is an error in your custom implementation?
I have been playing with separate calls to `enrol` and `register` myself and it seems to be working for me. You have to make sure you do `register` before `enrol` but I'm sure you know that!

I have a separate question for those in the know- it appears that the HLC SDK doesn't provide any authentication mechanisms out of the box? As in, an off-chain database to store membership data and login credentials is essentially a requirement? It seems like I need to build something around the enrolment / registration process to allow users of a web app to authenticate themselves with their previously-enrolled identity?
